g:HTML.p: This program demonstrates lib-gwt-file, an open-source GWT library to encapsulate the W3C file API . It has been tested with FF4 and Chromium 12. For more details, please visit http://www.vectomatic.org/lib-gwt-file.

p.i: NOTE: None of the files you select on your filesystem will actually be uploaded to a server. The files are just loaded locally and displayed in your browser.
